sourceOfFunds.purpose: The budget sanctioned under pay & allowances for Technical, Non tech. and Supporting staff (16 staff of KVK) of Krishi Vigyan Kendra, Solapur-I Maharashtra out of total sanctioned Rs 1,32,00,000/- the amount of Rs. 1,30,60,962/- was utilized for payment of salaries of KVK staff as per ICAR norms. During the year 2018-19 respectively.
For conducting technical activities viz. Training, Front Line Demonstration, On Farm Trials, Extension activities, Maintenance of farm, Advisories, TA/DA, contingencies

KVK, Solapur-I was sanctioned Rs 22,500 for construction of Compost pit & Swachhata activities. Three NADEP unit of size 6x4x3 ft were constructed at KVK, Campus for organic wase management under SAP during keeping the campus clean. Out of total sanctioned amount of Rs. 22,500 all funds (100%) were utilized.

The total budget of 3,06,400/- has been sanctioned for Skill Development Training Programme of Sericulturist & Floriculturist during the year 2018-19 under RKVY head. Out of total budget sanctioned total Rs. 2,94,578/- has been utilized for conducting the Skill Development Training Programme of Sericulturist with 20 no of participant & Floriculturist of 18 no of participant having 200 hs of two programme with 38 no of total beneficiary.

The total budget of Rs. 80,000/- has been sanctioned for the Pre Rabi Campaign. The same has been utilized as per the guidelines. The programme was conducted at village Pimpari (P), Tal; Barshi on14.02.2019 Ex. Associate Dean, MPKV, Rahuri, Dr. A. N. Deshpande , was the chief guest guided farmers to change or adopt other crop then Jowar, Pigeon pea, i.e. Bamboo Dragaon fruit etc. Also conducted field visit to the CFLD plot on INM

The budget sanctioned under pay & allowances for Technical, Non tech. and Supporting staff (16 staff of KVK) of Krishi Vigyan Kendra, Solapur-I Maharashtra out of total sanctioned Rs 1,42,00,000/- the amount of Rs. 1,38,35,853/- was utilized for payment of salaries of KVK staff as per ICAR norms. During the year 2019-20 respectively.
For conducting technical activities viz. Training, Front Line Demonstration, On Farm Trials, Extension activities, Maintenance of farm, Advisories, TA/DA, contingencies

The sanctioned total amount of Rs. 75,000/- for the year 2019-20 cluster Front Line Demonstration on Oilseed (Soybean) Kharif 2019-20. Out of total sanctioned amount Rs. 30,340/-has been utilized for conduction of CFLD on Kharif 2019 Soybean. The CFLD’s were conducted at Sakat villages of Barshi Tahsil of Solapur district variety MAUS-162 along with INM resulted in 30% yield improvement over local. The CFLD on oilseed (Soybean) was implemented on 25 farmers field on 10 ha area.

The sanctioned total amount of Rs. 3,60,000/- for CFLD pulsed on pigeon pea & chickpea for year 2019-20. The CFLD on Pigeon pea were conducted during kharif 2019 by using improved variety BDN-711 & ICM result in 73.53% yield improvement. The FLD’s on pigeon pea were implemented on 20 ha area on 50 farmers of Dhorale, Sakat & Pimpari (P) village of Barshi. CFLD;s On Rabi at 50 farmers of Sakat, Dhorale & Pimpari (P) village by using Phule Vikram.

The total budget of Rs. 17,88,000/- has been sanctioned for ARYA Project during 2019-20. Out of total budget sanctioned total Rs. 14,24,469/-/- were utilized for strengthening of demonstration units of ARYA enterprises viz. Seed Production in Chickpea, Vermicompost production, Commercial Goat farming

The total amount of Rs 15,000/- sanctioned for National Animal Disease Campaign Programme (NADCP) during the year 2019-20 were utilized as per the norms for conducting NADCP at KVK Solapur on 11.09.2019 chief guest for the function was Hon’bl Dr. Jaisiddheshwar Shivacharya Mahaswamiji MP, Solapur. Whereas chairman SKP, Hon’ble Mr. P. J. Gaikwad had chaired the function live webcasting of Hon. PM, address to the farmers was shown to the gathering total 191 participated in the programme.

The sanctioned total amount of Rs. 4,80,000/- (Four lakhs eighty thousand) for the year 2018-19 CFLD on Oilseed (Soybean) Kharif 2018-19.
